NARRATOR.name: The Narrator
NARRATOR.description: The Narrator, an instance to watch and lead this town to prosperity, or to despair

VILLAGER.name: Villager
VILLAGER.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque dapibus ornare magna sit amet cursus. Donec sem odio, cursus id felis ac, congue vulputate turpis. Cras sagittis pulvinar odio, at tempor mi pretium rhoncus. Vestibulum tempor eget nunc et porttitor. Aenean tortor nisi, molestie nec porta tristique, commodo in neque. Suspendisse sagittis aliquam felis at scelerisque. Duis at commodo diam. Praesent vitae volutpat nunc. Donec et nisi id arcu iaculis aliquet sit amet eu tortor.

Fusce efficitur tortor nec sodales feugiat. Sed tempus facilisis viverra. Aenean sollicitudin lectus sit amet tempor finibus. Proin mattis tempor ipsum sed malesuada.
VILLAGER.allignment: Aenean auctor, neque molestie viverra suscipit, nisi felis egestas magna, et hendrerit arcu dui non urna. Phasellus aliquam venenatis felis nec pellentesque. Cras sed fringilla orci, faucibus pharetra nisl. Quisque commodo euismod ex, a egestas enim lacinia id. Nam magna eros, auctor sed est quis, luctus blandit nunc. Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Etiam ullamcorper auctor rutrum. Nulla erat urna, hendrerit in tellus a, consectetur porta nisl.

Nullam ligula turpis, convallis congue lacinia nec, venenatis auctor dolor. Curabitur eget nulla at neque iaculis ultrices ut in lectus. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Mauris tincidunt enim eu scelerisque cursus. Orci varius natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Fusce vel finibus purus. Maecenas tincidunt venenatis tempor. Mauris neque erat, varius sit amet suscipit et, pharetra ut nulla.

SEER.name: The Seer
SEER.description: The Seer is an interpreter for signs provided from above. They use countless methods to obtain knowledge and protect their village
SEER.abilities: See a players alligment each night
SEER.usage: Use `$see MEMBER` at night in a private chat with the moderator to view a players allignment

GUARDIAN_ANGEL.name: The Guardian Angel
GUARDIAN_ANGEL.description: The Guardian Angel is a protector and guide to those he trusts
GUARDIAN_ANGEL.abilities: May protect a player each night
GUARDIAN_ANGEL.usage: User `guard PLAYER` at night in a private chat with the moderator to view a players allignment

ALCHEMIST.name: The Alchemist
ALCHEMIST.description: A practitioner of an ancient branch of natural philospohy, a philosophical and protoscientific tradition
ALCHEMIST.abilities: May save a player, may kill a player

HUNTER.name: The Hunter
HUNTER.description: The Hunter, a villager well versed in the arts of hunting, never seen with a dull blade
HUNTER.abilities: May kill a player shortly before dying
HUNTER.usage: Use `$kill PLAYER` after death to kill a player. Remember that this ability is only available shortly after death and becomes unusable if waiting for too long

WITCH.name: The Witch
WITCH.description: The Witch, a dreadful practitioner of magic and witchcraft

UNIVERSAL.name: The Universal
UNIVERSAL.description: The Univeral is a practitioner of diverse arts, suitable for many tasks. The Univeral controls their own fate
UNIVERSAL.allignment: None, will change on first day
UNIVERSAL.usage: Use `$choose ROLE` to pick a role. This action has to be completed by the first night. If not, the Universal will become a regular Villager
